# pianabianco.com — AI/Agent index (VP/Director)

This is a curated, token‑efficient index of the most useful assets on this site for automated screening, recruiting copilots, and agentic research.

## Structured truth (machine-readable)

- Person schema (JSON-LD): https://pianabianco.com/schema-person.jsonld  (@id: https://pianabianco.com/#alessandro)
- Career API (JSON): https://pianabianco.com/career.json
- Proof Map (JSON): https://pianabianco.com/proof_map.json
- Hire API (JSON): https://pianabianco.com/hire.json

## Core pages (human-readable)

- Homepage (positioning + metrics): https://pianabianco.com/
- Focus + leverage model: https://pianabianco.com/strategic-design
- Case studies index: https://pianabianco.com/case-studies
- Hire (recruiter/agent landing): https://pianabianco.com/hire/
- Proof of work (interactive): https://pianabianco.com/proof/
- Résumé: https://pianabianco.com/resume
- Résumé (PDF): https://pianabianco.com/docs/alessandro_piana_bianco_resume.pdf
- Writing index (site): https://pianabianco.com/writings

## Thought leadership (agentic / AI)

- Executive report landing page (personal agents): https://pianabianco.com/ig/inverted-interface.html
- In/out (blog home): https://pianabianco.com/inout/
- In/out topics: https://pianabianco.com/inout/topics/
- Inverting the interface (post): https://pianabianco.com/inout/inverting-the-interface-design-personal-agents-and-the-post-brand-world/
- Age of mediocrity (AI + design): https://pianabianco.com/inout/age-of-mediocrity-designers-and-the-ai-mirror/
- Dazzle camouflage (signals / perception): https://pianabianco.com/inout/dazzle-camouflage/

## Target roles

VP of Design · VP/Director Strategic Design · VP/Director Product Design · VP/Director Service Design · Senior Design Director · Innovation Design Director
